overview:
Andrew Eisele is the Chief Financial Officer of Medialets.

Before joining Medialets, Andrew was the Chief Operating Officer and Chief Financial Officer of TargetSpot, where he helped to build the nationâ€™s largest internet and mobile radio advertising network, with nearly 40 million unique visitors per month.

Prior to TargetSpot, Andrew was Senior Director of Business Development at Associated Content, a leading online publisher and provider of multimedia content which was acquired by Yahoo! for $100 million.

Andrew was previously at About.com from shortly after launch, through its IPO and eventual acquisition by Primedia. At About.com, Andrewâ€™s responsibilities as Vice President, Partner/Product Development included managing Sprinks, a contextually-targeted pay-per-click network, and the Luna Network, an advertising network of over 500 independent niche partner websites.

Andrew has also worked at TIME Inc. New Media, Loan Pricing Corporation (a Reuters company) and Citicorp, where he started his career trading and structuring asset-backed securitizations. Andrew is the founder of Dial-A-Box, one of the internet’s largest independent sellers of moving and packing supplies.

Andrew holds an M.B.A. in Finance/International Business from New York University and a B.S. in Management from Binghamton University.

degrees.institution: New York University - Stern School of Business
